t:
“Dad, we were playing Hansel and Gretel and Olivia was playing the witch's role.”



That's what my kids said when I came into the kitchen and found a pungent smell coming
from the oven.
c:
When the screaming stopped, I warned them against killing the kidnapped kids so soon. It's difficult for me to get a new playmate for them everytime.



#hanselandgretel #fairytale #witch #burn #kill #play #kids #mistake
